    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Bike
    Entity for bike, containing state and behavior
    BikeSimApp
    The app that detects and handles input source and feeds input lines into CommandParser object which could be fed into simulator if not null.
    Command
    Command pattern basis
    CommandParser
    The class that validates and converts strings to commands
    Direction
    Direction enum type containing 'NORTH', 'EAST', 'SOUTH', and 'WEST'
    ForwardCommand
    Implements the command pattern to tell the simulator to move the vehicle forward.
    Grid
    Grid is the entity we will be using for state size and boundary management
    PlaceCommand
    Implements the command pattern to tell the simulator to place the vehicle with X Y and direction user inputs.
    ReportCommand
    Implements the command pattern to tell the simulator to report the vehicle's position.
    Simulator
    Simulator is the entity that orchestrates how the bike entity and grid entity interact
    TurnLeftCommand
    Implements the command pattern to tell the simulator to turn the vehicle left.
    TurnRightCommand
    Implements the command pattern to tell the simulator to turn the vehicle right.
